author: ajsutton
content: You donâ€™t get slashed for following a different hard fork (including not upgrading when others do) and can switch freely between the two forks without any slashing risk because signatures include the fork ID which changes at each hard fork. So signatures for attestations or blocks from one hard fork are invalid on the other hard fork.
